      • getClosestStreet

                                java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> streets)
        returns the name of the closest street
        Parameters:
        dists - arraylist of all the distances found in range
        streets - arraylist of all the street names
        Returns:
        String the name of the closest street found or empty if not found
